snippet.title: Bittersweet Birthday - Official Trailer | Guerrilla Collective 2024
snippet.description: Bittersweet Birthday is a 2D story-rich action exploration game developed by World Eater Games. Players must stay attentive with the game being part boss-rush where every encounter is a unique fight. Bittersweet Birthday is launching in early 2025 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC (Steam).
